content.title: Paid reviews Horizon
content.text: Horrible experience in Horizon restaurant. All the reviews are begging reviews from the waiters.Pathtic experience in Horizon .Earlier staff was very curtacy with guests now a days they are nothing to fit

content.title: Great Hotel
content.text: Great room, very clean. AC works great, water pressure in washroom is great. Washroom very clean and nice.  staff are very helpful and nice. Very accommodating and clean place. Restaurant is nice too, good food and service. Nice amenities.

content.title: Good hotel
content.text: Services are good , staff welcome and their hospitality is excellent. We always love Ramoji Group hotels We request you to maintain in future Food and rooms ambience and other facilities are up to the expectations

content.title: Zaffran
content.text: We had a great lunch time with Family .. Mr Siva was very helpful and courteous. God bless him.. we like to thank Novotel for maintaining the standards expected from a hotel of this type .. hope you visit again soon .  Thanks

content.title: Best hotel experience
content.text: Excellent location, right on Varun beach with the rooms having mesmerizing beach view. The open air lounge with the infinity swimming pool and seating areas offering beautiful view of the ocean. Excellent room service, awesome breakfast spread, delicious food, prompt and ever helpful staff and superb ambience.>We stayed in Rooms 126 and 502 both having superb beach view.

content.title: Sandeep
content.text: Hi, went to the hotel with family Ambience was ok ok, food was not that bad, but the service was good, the food was served by the  man named Hossani. Thanks for his service that which he helped in selecting the food items.

content.title: Awesome vacation. The private beach access feels wonderful to experience.
content.text: The Park has become a personal favourite to our family now. My son likes the almost private beach. My wife loves the spa and pool. I love the sea views. We had a great stay. Kanaka especially was very affable and quite brilliant with her service. A big shout out to Sayani as well for her flawless and meticulous service. Thank you Park for a wonderful stay.

content.title: Worth it
content.text: Good hotel üè® with positive vibes ‚ú® we requested for interconnecting rooms we got we requested for packed breakfast we got Ms tazeen was helping us in everything. Really happy to stay and food was also very good worth for money üí∞

content.title: Exllient
content.text: Exllient good service room clean and star very good  and manager good breakfast lunch dinner very good best to best next time this hotel stay and rate  good normal near market and room view best seein

content.title: Nice experience
content.text: Food was good and fresh. Didnt know that buffet is limited on weekdays. Ambience is very good. Staff name : GaneshWould definitely love to visit again. Lobby atmosphere is nice and the staff are very friendly.

content.title: Very nice hotel
content.text: This is not my first time to visit this hotel, so I have something to compare with.  I consider this hotel one of the best places to visit.  Clean, comfortable rooms, large selection of dishes in the restaurant.  Polite, helpful staff.  The work of Muskan should be especially noted for its high professionalism and good service.

content.title: The park gives you a great experience with wonderful bayside and sea views.
content.text: The park gives you a great experience with wonderful bayside and sea views. The rooms are clean, spacious, and you can't miss the views from your room.The staff was so friendly and the room service by Pydamma was neat, the delicious breakfast is complimentary. I would rate this hotel an 8 out of 10

content.title: Awesome vacation. The private beach access feels wonderful to experience.
content.text: The Park has become a personal favourite to our family now. My son likes the almost private beach. My wife loves the spa and pool. I love the sea views. We had a great stay. Kanaka especially was very affable and quite brilliant with her service. A big shout out to Sayani as well for her flawless and meticulous service. Thank you Park for a wonderful stay.

content.title: Very good experience for day 1
content.text: Excellent service from suresh!! Behavior is good!! Very quick service ...glad to be here and looking forward for more help. He is taking all the services very seriously and happy for his service. Thanks

content.title: Green park
content.text: I was staying in green park 5th time everytime they given good services.everytime  Suchitra has given good room and Phani is very helpful I had a good experience here. I like to stay here I felt like a second home . Comfortable stay to everytime

content.title: Good stay with green park
content.text: Very good hotel the staff are so nice the foods are delicious feel safe always the rooms are so clean and big the internet is fast all th√© appliances are working in thier room might prefer this hotel thankyou!

content.title: Very Good experience
content.text: Very good in service. In good moral character of the hotel staff. good ambiance. nice food and accommodation. also very good in terms of place. big credit to the hotel staff. must visit this hotel. Good people
